environment.MASTER_ADDR: hostname of the machine running the script
environment.NNODES: number of nodes specified in PBS script
environment.NTOTRANKS: total number of MPI ranks to start
environment.NDEPTH: 16 (specifies how many cores/threads to space MPI ranks apart on each node)
environment.OMP_NUM_THREADS: not explicitly defined, but likely set by default to 1

software.nvidia-smi: used to determine the number of GPUs per node

hardware.GPUs: required for the NCCL library to function
